outputs.output_descr:
Output 1: National Circumstances
Output 2: National Green House Gas Inventories
Output 3: Programmes containing measures to facilitate Climate Chnage mitigation
Output 4: Programmes containing measures to facilitate adaptation to climate change
Output 5:  Other information considered relevant towards achieving the objective of the UNFCCC

project_descr: Enabling Activities for the Preparation of the Second National Communication of Bangladesh to the UNFCCC
